name: DilloQuest
description:
This is the page for our student project, DilloQuest.

In Dillo Quest, you must guide our hero Dillo through the golem's arena Using your unique armadillo skill set to roll up into a ball, spring off your tail, and glide through the air. But don’t think that the golem will be stopped easily! He has armed his arena ers from floor to ceiling!
